snippet: A federal judge struck down the District of Columbia's ban on carrying guns outside of a person's home, concluding it violates Second Amendment rights....

headline.print_headline: Judge Strikes Down DC Ban on Handguns Outside Home
headline.main: Judge Strikes Down DC Ban on Handguns Outside Home

lead_paragraph: A federal judge struck down the District of Columbia's ban on carrying guns outside of a person's home, concluding it violates Second Amendment rights.
